alert.note: Alert for Cross; Poinsett; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern St. Francis, western Poinsett and Cross Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near McFadden to near Vanndale to 6 miles north of New Home. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wynne, Harrisburg, Parkin, Village Creek State Park, Weiner, Cherry Valley, Hickory Ridge, Waldenburg, Vanndale, New Home, Fisher, Smithdale, Hydrick, Wiley Crossing, Birdeye, Cottonwood Corner, Fitzgerald Crossing, Supply, Stewart and Colton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
